body.para: I am using qtopia onÂ my freerunner.
Sometimes, there are two incoming calls from same number simultaneously and both cannot be answered....
And sometimes at dialing end, user get to hear that my phone is switched off
Even after volume in profile set as maximum, sound is less audible...Can i increase the volume in any other ways
